content.question: In the ninth paragraph, the author relates the story of her niece (“When my . . . support her”) primarily to

choices.label: express regret for the author’s failure to support her family
cite a factor that inspired her to take on a particular screen role
identify one aspect of her family’s situation that is atypical
illustrate the negative effects of family fragmentation on children

content.answer: illustrate the negative effects of family fragmentation on children

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
